body: Looks like we cannot fix it with Alpine from our side.
@samdark but I have a fix for it and it is backwards compatible? I do not see any real reason not to support alpine for this reason?
Btw I pointed some issues only for help with issue verification. Personally don't have any objections about proposed fix, don't know about pitfalls.
@mikk150 if you're sure it works for all cases, go ahead with a pull request.
Oh. Sorry. I'm losing track of things focusing on 3.0 :)
@mikk150 would you please take a look at @MysteryDragon comments in a pull request? Seems there are errors to be handled better...
